emuInput.TitMainTitle: Group portrait of wedding party including groom James Norman Schofield and bride Mary Boyce Hutson, standing behind two tiered wedding cake, in home on Magee Street with bold print wallpaper of ivy frames and polka dots, another version
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, January 10, 1959, pg. 13 reads: "Mr. And Mrs. James Norman Schofield - Mary Boyce Hutson became the bride of James Norman Schofield in pretty rites performed Dec. 20 in family home on Magee St. The pre-holiday ritual was attended by family and close friends. - Harris Photo."
